item.description:
Yoga in the Park on Sunday Mornings!

Hey yoga lovers, both Newbies and advanced levels welcome. Have you ever wanted to try a yoga class outside?  Let's celebrate the warmer days and beautiful New England landscape by practicing yoga near the water!

BYOM - (Bring your own mat) - we do have a few extra mats for those that do need a mat, please let us know beforehand.

The class will run every Sunday morning; starting at 10 AM until 11:15 AM (please try to arrive a few minutes early to ensure signing in and preparing for the yoga class).  The outside location is next to the parking lot at Webb Memorial Park in North Weymouth along the water, usually left of the parking lot (if you are walking toward the park).

Lee is a certified yoga instructor, she has been teaching for over 7 years and remains an active instructor for various places and types of classes.  She was the instructor from last year's event 'Downward Doggin' yoga classes.

So, all levels are welcome, and the price is $10 drop in rate. Please bring the full amount in exact amount if possible.

What you should bring with you for outside yoga? Yoga Mat, Towel, Water, and wear comfortable clothes, sun screen, and layers of clothing in case you get hot.

If it rains, cancellation will be posted or sent no later than 1-2 hours beforehand.

Please RSVP by Saturday to ensure that there are five or more attendees for the class, or else the class could be cancelled due to low attendance.

 

Namaste!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be near the picnic tables on the left if you are walking toward the park (or else to the right)

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Yoga in the Park
